Blackbox Accelerate

Blackbox Accelerate is a customized, one year program to take your company to the next stage.

Blackbox Accelerate is offered to qualified Blackbox Connect Alumni, Blackbox Residents, or companies referred by the partners

If we believe we can help you, we commit to accelerate your growth for one year. You will join the global Blackbox community, stay at the Blackbox Mansion, get legal and administrative help to set up a US presence of your company, recruit and build global core startup team, and raise investment capital. With the value that we provide we earn small equity in your company and align our interests long term.

Contact us to apply for the accelerate program: accelerate@blackbox.vc

Our Value Proposition

  • Exposure to the most eager technology investors in the World. With over $10 billion of venture capital invested annually, Silicon Valley makes more investments in startups than any other region in the World. Blackbox team has an extensive network of investor relations. Blackbox is minutes away from the Wall Street of venture capital, Sand Hill Road.
  • Analysis and advice regarding how to build and scale a technology business on a global basis.
  • Introductions to strategic relationships. Blackbox team members are most likely within one or two relationship degrees from the most relevant thought leaders within your company's space.
  • Recruitment of an advisory board consisting of experienced experts
  • $50K+ in services provided by partnering companies such as Google Developers Startup Pack and Rackspace hosting spaces.
  • Longer-term residence and/or free work space at the Blackbox mansion
